data.introduction: Experienced Web developer with sound programming and scripting skills. Eager to learn new technologies and adapt quickly to new frameworks. My aim is to apply 'Test driven' approach to develop fast, scalable, secure and responsive websites following agile methodologies.
professionalSummary: 2.3 years of extensive experience in design, development and integration of MEAN/MERN stack applications using React.js with Redux/React Hooks, Angular 7, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, MySQL.
Good knowledge of JavaScript's ES7 standards and its features
Experience in development of RESTful web services and API testing tool such as Postman.
Good understanding of SEO and its best practices.
Hands on experience in Version Control System like SVN, GIT.
Hands on experience in Agile project and project management tools like JIRA.
Hands on experience in using IDE like Visual Studio Code, Eclipse.
Hands on experience in website testing tools such as BrowserStack, Google Lighthouse.
workExperience: Worked as Senior Systems Engineer at Infosys Private Limited, Bangalore from November 2017 to till date.

projects.technologyTitle: React.js - Redux, Node.js, Express.js, GraphQL, DynamoDB, Jest, Enzyme.
projects.projectDescription: Sears Parts Direct is a department store consisting of millions of replacement parts for most major brands of appliances, outdoor power equipment etc. It's goal is to help new and experienced DIYers quickly find and order the right part, from any device.

projectStack.description: Developed a fast, scalable and responsive E-commerce website.
responsibilities: Developed UI designs and wire frames into a functional web page with quality code.
Built re-usable components and front-end libraries to eliminate code duplication.
Developed searchable autosuggestion component to search available items.
Developed filter tree feature to filter items list by their brands or categories.
Used Query Components with Apollo GraphQL to handle API request in the application.
Performed page optimization by using Lighthouse Report.
Have good understanding of SEO and it's best practices.
Used Jest with Enzyme for writing Unit Tests for UI components.
Used Pupeteer to run automated UI testing.
Used Sass with BEM naming for CSS styling.

projectStack.description: Developed API to implement Checkout and Payment feature for user be able to purchase items by adding to cart.
responsibilities: Analyzed Schema for server-side cart checkout implementation.
Developed API to perform CRUD operation on cart items and coupons.
Implemented Coupon feature to provide discount for certain parts.
Validated API response with GraphQL playground.
Wrote Unit Tests for server code using moche and karma.
Integrated backend API with the frontend UI and verified the overall functionality of the website.

projects.projectDescription: Developed a MEAN stack application to implement CRUD operations for a portal to manage Employee details.
projectResponsibilites: Created a Backend server using Node.js and Express.js to handle http requests.
Created a Relational Database using MySQL for data storage and retrieval.
Created a Frontend application using Angular 5 and integrated it with the database and server.

projects.technologyTitle: Angular 5, Node.js, Express.js, MySQL, Python, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap.
projects.projectDescription: Infosys Freshers Training Program is divided into 2 phases, Generic training and Stream training. Trained on Python fundamentals, Data Structures and Algorithm, Database Languages and Web Development.

projects.technologyTitle: React.js/ Redux.js, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, Postman, Heroku.
projects.projectDescription: DevConnector is a Social Network application for developers consisting of various user posts and post discussions.
projectResponsibilites: Implemented user registration, login and authentication features.
Implemented user’s profile page showing the user’s professional information.
Implemented Forum page containing various posts and discussions.

projects.projectDescription: It is an online notes application with Register and Login feature. The individual notes can be easily copied to clipboard using dedicated copy button.
projectResponsibilites: Implemented CRUD functionality that can be used to create, save, edit notes and access it from any device on the go.
It has google firebase login feature implemented for individual user access and privacy.
It has a search feature to filter notes by search keywords.

projects.projectDescription: A basic JS game of dodging incoming enemies to gain points. The game has 3 difficulty modes for challenging gameplay.
projectResponsibilites: Implemented Player and Enemy characters, with various speed capabilities based on selected difficulty mode.
Objective is to reach from start to destination without colliding with incoming enemies.
Player have to score the best points possible with 10 lives in hand within 5 minutes.

hackathon.title: Infosys Global Hackathon 2019.
hackathon.description: Runner up in "Infosys Global Hackathon 2019" at Infosys, Trivandrum DC for developing a mobile application to help the visually challenged people to identify currency notes using Google Cloud Vision. (65 Teams)

awards.title: Most Valuable Player.
awards.description: Received “MVP Award for Outstanding contribution towards Project Deliverables” award from Infosys.

certificates.title: JavaScript Proficiency Certification, Google Plural Sight.
Front end Web Developer Nanodegree, Udacity.
Object Oriented Programming using C++, NIIT.

skills.Framework: React.js, Redux.js, Angular 7, Node.js, Express.js, Jest, Enzyme.
skills.Scripting/ Markup/ Styling: Javascript (ES7), HTML 5, CSS 3 (SASS), Bootstrap 4, Material Bootstrap.
skills.Other Tools: Git, Jira, Heroku, BrowserStack, Slack, Postman.
